metadata.name: Sparkler Sculpture
metadata.description:
Sparkler Sculpture

Size: 3000 x 4500 pixels

From the Series "Five Days (New York)", 2020

"Five Days" shows simple sculptural arrangements created and photographed in a studio, combined with images of streets in NYC taken over the course of five days. None of the sculptures were ever on location.
The images where created with social media in mind - to walk the thin line between trolling the viewer and engaging them in a playful way to question the nature of images perceived online.

[thomasalbdorf.com/five-days](https://thomasalbdorf.com/five-days/)
